languages.text: "То не жажда, но долг. Убийства не доставляют нам наслаждения. Они — лишь инструмент исполнения Его воли".
"There is no thirst, only duty. Killing brings us no pleasure. We are instruments of His will, and this is how we serve Him."
languages.original_text: "То не жажда, но долг. Убийства не доставляют нам наслаждения. Они — лишь инструмент исполнения Его воли".

traits.locale_text: "There is no thirst, only duty. Killing brings us no pleasure. It is merely an instrument for executing His will."
"There is no thirst, only duty. Killing brings us no pleasure. It is merely an instrument for executing His will."
"There is no thirst, only duty. Killing brings us no pleasure. We are instruments of His will, and this is how we serve Him."
"There is no thirst, only duty. Killing brings us no pleasure. We are instruments of His will, and this is how we serve Him."
"There is no thirst, only duty. Killing brings us no pleasure. We are instruments of His will, and this is how we serve Him."
"There is no thirst, only duty. Killing brings us no pleasure. We are instruments of His will, and this is how we serve Him."

languages.text: «No existe tal sed, solo el deber. Matar no me produce ningún placer. Somos instrumentos de Su voluntad, y así es como le servimos».
languages.original_text: "There is no thirst, only duty. Killing brings us no pleasure. We are instruments of His will, and this is how we serve Him."

traits.locale_text: «No existe tal sed, solo el deber. Matar no me produce ningún placer. Somos instrumentos de Su voluntad, y así es como le servimos».

languages.text: 「渇きはないわ、あるのは聖務成就の誓いだけ。殺しは喜びをもたらさない。私たちは主の意思の道具であり、そうすることで主に奉仕するのです」
languages.original_text: "There is no thirst, only duty. Killing brings us no pleasure. We are instruments of His will, and this is how we serve Him."

traits.locale_text: 「渇きはないわ、あるのは聖務成就の誓いだけ。殺しは喜びをもたらさない。私たちは主の意思の道具であり、そうすることで主に奉仕するのです」

languages.text: “没有渴望，只有责任。杀戮不会给我们带来任何快乐。我们不过是履行不死之神旨意的工具，我们就是这么服侍祂的。”
languages.original_text: "There is no thirst, only duty. Killing brings us no pleasure. We are instruments of His will, and this is how we serve Him."

traits.locale_text: “没有渴望，只有责任。杀戮不会给我们带来任何快乐。我们不过是履行不死之神旨意的工具，我们就是这么服侍祂的。”

languages.text: "Es gibt keinen Durst, nur die Pflicht. Töten bringt uns keine Freude. Wir sind Instrumente Seines Willens, und so dienen wir Ihm."
languages.original_text: "There is no thirst, only duty. Killing brings us no pleasure. We are instruments of His will, and this is how we serve Him."

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt keinen Durst, nur die Pflicht. Töten bringt uns keine Freude. Wir sind Instrumente Seines Willens, und so dienen wir Ihm."

languages.text: « Ce n'est pas une question de soif, seulement de devoir. Nous ne prenons aucun plaisir à donner la mort. Nous sommes les instruments de Sa volonté, et c'est ainsi que nous Le servons. »
languages.original_text: "There is no thirst, only duty. Killing brings us no pleasure. We are instruments of His will, and this is how we serve Him."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est pas une question de soif, seulement de devoir. Nous ne prenons aucun plaisir à donner la mort. Nous sommes les instruments de Sa volonté, et c'est ainsi que nous Le servons. »

languages.original_text: "There is no thirst, only duty. Killing brings us no pleasure. We are instruments of His will, and this is how we serve Him."

languages.text: "Kana susamışlık değil, görev aşkı. Öldürmekten zevk almayız. Bizler O'nun iradesinin aracıyız. O'na böyle hizmet ederiz."
languages.original_text: "There is no thirst, only duty. Killing brings us no pleasure. We are instruments of His will, and this is how we serve Him."
